text: Hello. I try to create a workflow where I get the SKU number from the line-items after a deal got created. I want to parse that SKU number into segments and depend on the segment I write information into the contact. Is that even possible without the API only with workflows?

Hi Thomas, this should be possible through Custom Coded Actions which is available through Operations Hub Professional. You can receive a property value in the Custom Code step and output the parsed value for other steps.

I think the tricky part is that you would have a hard time creating those outputs as they'd be dynamic. <@U033VNNBBBP> do you have a more detailed example? I'm speaking to my team about building out some functionality related to this use case and it would help us a lot to have a super concrete example
I thought so, that I need the OperationsHub Professional. I might use the API. I even hadnâ€™t see an option to grab the content out of the line items with the Operation Starter Plan.

The SKU is a code, like A2123BC where
A = Something
21 = Something
23 = Something
BC = Something
That's a great start. So let's say you have a Deal that creates 4 Line Items with 4 different SKUs. What would you hope to accomplish with the Workflow?
